title: HTTP Post
description: In this lab, we will explore the fundamentals of JavaScript programming. You will learn the basics of data types, variables, functions, and control structures. This lab is designed to help you gain a solid understanding of the core concepts of JavaScript programming, which will provide a foundation for more complex programming concepts in the future.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
